### targetSchedulesPostRAScheduling() {#abfab7e447bc6f3e58213d9b7bc11bed4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::ARMBaseTargetMachine::targetSchedulesPostRAScheduling () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
True if subtarget inserts the final scheduling pass on its own.

Branch relaxation, which must happen after block placement, can on some targets (e.g. <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/systemz">SystemZ</a>) expose additional post-RA scheduling opportunities.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armtargetmachine-h/#l00080">80</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armtargetmachine-h">ARMTargetMachine.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
